meanings.definition: The quality or state of being daily.
meanings.sent1: Her dailyness was evident in the way she always woke up at the same time each morning.
meanings.sent2: The dailyness of the sunrise brought a sense of comfort and familiarity.
meanings.sent3: The cat's dailyness in demanding breakfast at 6 am never failed to amuse the family.
meanings.sent4: The dailyness of the waves crashing against the shore was like a reliable heartbeat of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The dailyness of the routine made each day blend into the next, like pages in a well-read book.

meanings.definition: The routine or habit of occurring every day.
meanings.sent1: His dailyness involved a morning jog followed by a hearty breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The dailyness of her yoga practice helped her stay centered and calm.
meanings.sent3: The dailyness of the dog's excitement for walks was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The dailyness of the train's arrival became a reliable marker of time for the commuters.
meanings.sent5: The dailyness of the rain tapping on the window created a soothing backdrop for reading.
